archdesc.scopecontent: "This DVD contains the complete history of Greek Detroit--the traditions, the food and the music. Majestic sequences throughout 'the old country' are hosted by business mogul Bill Damas and World War II survivor Despina Kartakis, showing a side of Greek Detroit that has never before been seen"--Container.
